hero.title: Stichiboi
hero.description: I'm Daniele, and I love building tools for people.
hero.description2: I aim for efficiency and uncompromising quality.
hero.description3: If I have to do it twice, I'll probably automate it.

intro.title: Daniele Mazzotta - Full Stack Engineer
intro.text: "Full" isn't just the usual frontend + backend.
intro.text2: I mean it from UI design to CI/CD ops.
intro.imageAlt: A photo of me doing cardistry

about.text: Here, you'll find a collection of my projects that showcase my skills, passion, and creativity. From web development to software applications, I've tackled diverse challenges, demonstrating versatility, dedication, and exceptional results.
about.title: Projects

sudoku.title: Sudoku
sudoku.description: Sudokus are holiday homework for adults. Now with dark mode.
sudoku.alt: Enjoy a cool sudoku. For free. No ads.

parodle.title: Parodle
parodle.disclaimer: from a human point of view.
parodle.alt: Wordle in italian. Play as much as you like.

silenciometer.title: Silenciometer
silenciometer.description: Measure the noise around you. Used to gamify quietness in a classroom. Or to see how consistent is my whistling.

stichisand.title: Stichisand
stichisand.description: Cute sand game. Remember to share your designs!
stichisand.alt: Draw with falling sand, since paint is too simple to use

reflexo.title: Reflexo
reflexo.description: Top-level gamers require top-level reflexes. Try to measure them, and see if you can improve.
reflexo.alt: Test your skill and improve your high score.
